a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Time spent in domestic work, female vs. male, 2019
The share of each day that women and men aged 20-74 spent on food preparation, dishwashing,
cleaning and upkeep of a dwelling, laundry, ironing, gardening, caring for pets, shopping, installation,
servicing and repair of personal and household goods, childcare, and care of the sick, elderly or disabled
Proportion of time spent on unpaid domestic and care work, male (% of 24 hour day)
Proportion of time spent on unpaid domestic and care
Data source: World Bank, Gender Statistics (based on multiple sources)
